updates.title: ChatGPT launches group chats globally, enabling teams to collaborate on projects with AI assistance for coordination, document co-writing, and research.
Google releases Nano Banana Pro with enhanced image generation capabilities including web search integration, higher resolutions, and improved text rendering for designers.
Gemini AI assistant begins global rollout to Android Auto, replacing Google Assistant with enhanced voice capabilities for playlists, email access, and city information.
Bret Taylor's AI agent startup Sierra achieves $100M ARR in under two years, signaling rapid enterprise adoption of AI customer service solutions.
Voice AI company Wispr secures $25M funding from Notable Capital as their dictation app gains traction, highlighting growing investment in voice-powered creative tools.
